author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-3169 Add continuation synchronize block to avoid continuation is resumed befor it is suspended by the other thread

author: stsp
msg: (svn_cl__commit): In an attempt to prevent surprises due to issue #3699,
when commits are performed with a depth smaller than infinity, print
a warning explaining that copied directories will regardless be copied
with infinite depth. This is not a fix for issue #3699, of course, and
more work is needed to get to the desired behaviour described by Bert

author: nash
msg: Fix resource exclusion patterns so that files under the target directory aren't incorrectly treated as resources

author: rjung
msg: The test which needs that configuration isn't
executed for 2.0, so removing the incompatible config

author: veithen
msg: Removed some old unused stuff from CommonsHTTPTransportSender.
